EN#Imagination is more important than knowledge
EN#If I have made any valuable discoveries, it has been more by having patience than any other talent
EN#Be the change that you wish to see in the world
EN#Nothing in life is to be feared, it is only to be understood
EN#Learning never exhausts the mind
EN#Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts
EN#The ultimate measure of a man is not where he stands in moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at times of challenge and controversy
EN#The secret of getting ahead is getting started
EN#Feet, what do I need you for when I have wings to fly
EN#Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work
EN#The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want
EN#Love your neighbor as yourself
EN#Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and do not lean on your own understanding
EN#For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life
EN#God is love
EN#Fear not, for I am with you; be not dismayed, for I am your God; I will strengthen you, I will help you, I will uphold you with my righteous right hand
EN#Honor your father and your mother, that your days may be long in the land that the Lord your God is giving you
EN#The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom; all those who practice it have a good understanding
EN#The Lord is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
EN#Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they shall be satisfied
EN#Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out
EN#Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement. Nothing can be done without hope and confidence
EN#It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop
EN#It is never too late to be what you might have been
EN#Difficulties prepare ordinary people for extraordinary destinies
EN#Do not wait for the perfect moment, take the moment and make it perfect
EN#Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful
EN#Believe in yourself and all that you are. Know that there is something inside you that is greater than any obstacle
EN#The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person\'s determination
EN#It\'s not how many times you fall, but how many times you get up that counts
